author: Nova
dedicatedTo: For Allie, whose love bridges oceans and connects hearts across the world

pages.englishText: Popo and Gong Gong's Visit
pages.chineseText: 婆婆和公公来访
pages.chinesePinyin: Pópó hé Gōnggōng Láifǎng
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style title page illustration featuring Allie (toddler with short black hair in colorful clothes) standing between Popo (Asian grandmother, early 60s, short BLACK bob hair, no glasses, warm smile) and Gong Gong (Asian grandfather, early 60s, short BLACK hair, CLEAN-SHAVEN face, no glasses, kind expression). Behind them glows a magical coffee cup portal with swirling steam. Oscar, a solid grey Scottish Fold cat with folded ears, sits at their feet. Small ladybugs dot the scene. The style is colorful, warm, and whimsical.

pages.englishText: One quiet evening in Rumson, Allie looked at a photo on the wall and felt sad.
pages.chineseText: 在拉姆森的一个安静的夜晚，艾丽看着墙上的一张照片，感到难过。
pages.chinesePinyin: Zài Lāmǔsēn de yīgè ānjìng de yèwǎn, Ài Lì kànzhe qiáng shàng de yī zhāng zhàopiàn, gǎndào nánguò.
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of a cozy living room at dusk. Allie, a toddler with short black hair wearing a pink dress, stands looking up at a framed family photo on the wall showing Popo and Gong Gong. Oscar the solid grey Scottish Fold cat sits beside her. Warm lamplight fills the room. A small ladybug sits on the photo frame.

pages.englishText: 'I miss Popo and Gong Gong,' Allie said softly. 'They live so far away.'
pages.chineseText: 「我想念婆婆和公公，」艾丽轻声说。「他们住得好远。」
pages.chinesePinyin: 'Wǒ xiǎngniàn Pópó hé Gōnggōng,' Ài Lì qīng shēng shuō. 'Tāmen zhù de hǎo yuǎn.'
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of Allie, a toddler with short black hair, looking wistful. Lu (petite Asian woman with medium-length black hair) kneels beside her, giving a comforting hug. Peter (tall lean blonde man, 40s, clean-shaven) stands nearby with a gentle expression. Oscar the solid grey cat nuzzles Allie's leg. The scene is tender and warm.

pages.englishText: Suddenly, Daddy's coffee cup on the table began to glow with golden light!
pages.chineseText: 突然，桌子上爸爸的咖啡杯开始发出金色的光芒！
pages.chinesePinyin: Túrán, zhuōzi shàng bàba de kāfēi bēi kāishǐ fāchū jīnsè de guāngmáng!
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of a white coffee cup on a wooden table glowing with brilliant golden magical light. Steam rises from the cup forming mystical swirls and shapes. Allie, Peter, Lu, and Oscar all stare at it in amazement. Sparkles fill the air. The room is lit by the warm golden glow.

pages.englishText: The steam from the coffee swirled up and up, making a shimmering doorway in the air!
pages.chineseText: 咖啡的蒸汽向上旋转，在空中形成了一扇闪闪发光的门！
pages.chinesePinyin: Kāfēi de zhēngqì xiàng shàng xuánzhuǎn, zài kōngzhōng xíngchéng le yī shàn shǎnshǎn fāguāng de mén!
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of magical steam rising from the coffee cup, forming a glowing portal doorway in mid-air. The portal shows glimpses of Chinese architecture and cherry blossoms beyond. Allie reaches toward it with wonder. Peter and Lu exchange amazed looks. Oscar's ears perk up curiously. Golden sparkles swirl around the portal.

pages.englishText: 'Let's go through!' said Mommy, taking Allie's hand. Oscar meowed and followed them.
pages.chineseText: 「我们穿过去吧！」妈妈牵着艾丽的手说。奥斯卡喵了一声跟着他们。
pages.chinesePinyin: 'Wǒmen chuān guòqù ba!' Māma qiānzhe Ài Lì de shǒu shuō. Àosīkǎ miāo le yī shēng gēnzhe tāmen.
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of Lu holding Allie's hand as they step toward the glowing portal. Peter follows behind them, and Oscar the solid grey Scottish Fold cat trots alongside. They are silhouetted against the bright golden portal entrance. Excitement and magic fill the scene.

pages.englishText: WHOOOOSH! They stepped through the portal and arrived in a beautiful home in China!
pages.chineseText: 嗖！他们穿过传送门，来到了中国的一个美丽的家！
pages.chinesePinyin: Sōu! Tāmen chuān guò chuánsòng mén, lái dào le Zhōngguó de yīgè měilì de jiā!
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of a traditional Chinese home interior with red lanterns, wooden furniture, and decorative scrolls on the walls. Allie, Peter, Lu, and Oscar emerge from the shimmering portal into this warm space. Chinese decorative elements like paper-cut art and ceramic vases are visible. Soft golden light fills the room.

pages.englishText: 'Allie! You came!' There stood Popo with open arms, smiling the biggest smile!
pages.chineseText: 「艾丽！你来了！」婆婆张开双臂站在那里，笑得最灿烂！
pages.chinesePinyin: 'Ài Lì! Nǐ lái le!' Pópó zhāngkāi shuāngbì zhàn zài nàlǐ, xiào de zuì cànlàn!
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of Popo (Asian grandmother, early 60s, short BLACK bob hair, no glasses, wearing a red traditional Chinese top) with arms wide open and a joyful smile. Behind her is a cozy Chinese home. Her expression radiates love and happiness. Warm light surrounds her. A small ladybug sits on a nearby plant.

pages.englishText: Gong Gong came out from the kitchen carrying a tray of steaming dumplings.
pages.chineseText: 公公从厨房里走出来，端着一盘热气腾腾的饺子。
pages.chinesePinyin: Gōnggōng cóng chúfáng lǐ zǒu chūlái, duānzhe yī pán rèqì téngténng de jiǎozi.
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of Gong Gong (Asian grandfather, early 60s, short BLACK hair, CLEAN-SHAVEN face, no glasses, wearing a casual shirt) carrying a bamboo steamer tray filled with beautiful dumplings. Steam rises from the dumplings. His face shows warmth and kindness. The kitchen doorway behind him shows traditional Chinese cookware.

pages.englishText: Allie ran into their arms. 'Popo! Gong Gong!' Oscar purred and rubbed against their legs.
pages.chineseText: 艾丽跑进他们的怀抱。「婆婆！公公！」奥斯卡呼噜呼噜地蹭着他们的腿。
pages.chinesePinyin: Ài Lì pǎo jìn tāmen de huáibào. 'Pópó! Gōnggōng!' Àosīkǎ hūlu hūlu de cèngzhe tāmen de tuǐ.
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of a heartwarming family reunion. Allie (toddler with short black hair) hugs both Popo and Gong Gong together. Oscar the solid grey Scottish Fold cat rubs affectionately against their legs. Everyone's faces show pure joy. Peter and Lu stand nearby smiling. Hearts and sparkles float in the air.

pages.englishText: 'Come, let's make dumplings together!' said Popo, leading them to a big wooden table.
pages.chineseText: 「来，我们一起包饺子！」婆婆领着他们来到一张大木桌前。
pages.chinesePinyin: 'Lái, wǒmen yīqǐ bāo jiǎozi!' Pópó lǐngzhe tāmen lái dào yī zhāng dà mù zhuō qián.
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of a large wooden table covered with dumpling-making supplies: bowls of filling, circles of dough, bamboo steamers, and rolling pins. Popo gestures welcomingly to the table. Allie looks excited, Oscar sniffs curiously at the ingredients. Chinese kitchen decorations are visible in the background.

pages.englishText: Gong Gong showed Allie how to fold the dough. 'Like this - pinch, pinch, pinch!'
pages.chineseText: 公公教艾丽怎么包饺子。「像这样——捏，捏，捏！」
pages.chinesePinyin: Gōnggōng jiāo Ài Lì zěnme bāo jiǎozi. 'Xiàng zhèyàng——niē, niē, niē!'
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of Gong Gong's hands gently guiding Allie's small hands as they fold a dumpling together. The dumpling is partially formed. Allie's face shows concentration and delight. Close-up view with soft lighting. A ladybug sits on the edge of the table watching.

pages.englishText: Everyone joined in! Mommy, Daddy, Popo, Gong Gong, and Allie made dumplings shaped like little moons.
pages.chineseText: 大家都加入了！妈妈、爸爸、婆婆、公公和艾丽做了像小月亮一样的饺子。
pages.chinesePinyin: Dàjiā dōu jiārù le! Māma, bàba, Pópó, Gōnggōng hé Ài Lì zuò le xiàng xiǎo yuèliàng yīyàng de jiǎozi.
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration showing all five family members around the table making dumplings together. Peter (tall blonde man) and Lu (Asian woman) laugh as they fold dough. Popo and Gong Gong show techniques with practiced hands. Allie sits on a cushion creating her own special dumpling. Oscar watches from beneath the table. The scene is warm, joyful, and full of love.

pages.englishText: When they cooked the dumplings, the most wonderful smell filled the whole house!
pages.chineseText: 当他们煮饺子时，最美妙的香味充满了整个房子！
pages.chinesePinyin: Dāng tāmen zhǔ jiǎozi shí, zuì měimiào de xiāngwèi chōngmǎn le zhěnggè fángzi!
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of a traditional Chinese kitchen with a large steaming pot on the stove. Visible steam carries illustrated aromatic swirls. The whole family crowds around watching eagerly. Oscar sits on the counter sniffing the air. The warm kitchen glows with golden light. Dumplings are visible floating in the bubbling water.

pages.englishText: After eating, Gong Gong said, 'Now, let's show you our secret garden!'
pages.chineseText: 吃完后，公公说：「现在，让我们带你看我们的秘密花园！」
pages.chinesePinyin: Chī wán hòu, Gōnggōng shuō: 'Xiànzài, ràng wǒmen dài nǐ kàn wǒmen de mìmì huāyuán!'
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of Gong Gong standing by a traditional Chinese red door with golden decorations. He gestures mysteriously toward it with a playful smile. The door has intricate carved patterns. Allie looks curious and excited. Oscar's tail swishes with interest. Soft evening light filters through.

pages.englishText: Through the door was a magical Chinese garden with a pond, willow trees, and stone bridges!
pages.chineseText: 门后面是一个神奇的中国花园，有池塘、柳树和石桥！
pages.chinesePinyin: Mén hòumiàn shì yīgè shénqí de Zhōngguó huāyuán, yǒu chítáng, liǔshù hé shí qiáo!
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of a breathtaking traditional Chinese garden. A serene koi pond reflects willow trees with drooping branches. An arched stone bridge crosses the water. Red pavilions with curved roofs sit among flowering plants. Lanterns hang from trees. Ladybugs flutter among the blossoms. The scene is peaceful and magical with soft golden-hour lighting.

pages.englishText: Colorful koi fish swam in circles. 'Look, they're dancing!' giggled Allie, pointing at the water.
pages.chineseText: 五颜六色的锦鲤在水中转圈游动。「看，它们在跳舞！」艾丽咯咯笑着指着水说。
pages.chinesePinyin: Wǔyán liùsè de jǐnlǐ zài shuǐ zhōng zhuàn quān yóudòng. 'Kàn, tāmen zài tiàowǔ!' Ài Lì gēgē xiàozhe zhǐzhe shuǐ shuō.
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of Allie leaning over the pond's edge with Popo holding her safely. Large colorful koi fish (orange, white, gold, and spotted) swim in graceful circles below. The water sparkles with ripples. Oscar peers at the fish with fascination. Gong Gong, Peter, and Lu stand nearby smiling. Cherry blossom petals float on the water.

pages.englishText: As the sun set, it was time to go home. 'We love you so much,' said Popo, hugging Allie tight.
pages.chineseText: 当太阳落山时，该回家了。「我们非常爱你，」婆婆紧紧地抱着艾丽说。
pages.chinesePinyin: Dāng tàiyáng luò shān shí, gāi huí jiā le. 'Wǒmen fēicháng ài nǐ,' Pópó jǐnjǐn de bàozhe Ài Lì shuō.
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of a tender sunset scene. Popo holds Allie in a loving embrace. Gong Gong's hand rests gently on Allie's head. The garden glows with golden sunset light. Peter, Lu, and Oscar stand nearby. The sky shows beautiful orange and pink colors. Tears of happiness glisten in Popo's eyes.

pages.englishText: They walked back through the glowing portal and arrived home in Rumson. The coffee cup stopped glowing.
pages.chineseText: 他们穿过发光的传送门回到了拉姆森的家。咖啡杯停止发光了。
pages.chinesePinyin: Tāmen chuān guò fāguāng de chuánsòng mén huí dào le Lāmǔsēn de jiā. Kāfēi bēi tíngzhǐ fāguāng le.
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of the family stepping out of the fading golden portal back into their Rumson living room. The coffee cup on the table dims to normal. Allie waves goodbye through the portal at Popo and Gong Gong who wave back from the Chinese garden. Oscar steps through last. The portal begins to fade like morning mist.

pages.englishText: 'They're always with us,' whispered Mommy, 'because love travels across any distance.' And it was true. The End.
pages.chineseText: 「他们永远和我们在一起，」妈妈轻声说，「因为爱能穿越任何距离。」这是真的。完。
pages.chinesePinyin: 'Tāmen yǒngyuǎn hé wǒmen zài yīqǐ,' Māma qīng shēng shuō, 'yīnwèi ài néng chuānyuè rènhé jùlí.' Zhè shì zhēn de. Wán.
pages.illustrationPrompt: A whimsical, cartoon-style illustration of a peaceful family moment. Allie sits between Peter and Lu on the couch, holding the framed photo of Popo and Gong Gong close to her heart. Oscar curls up in her lap purring. The room glows with warm lamplight. Through the window, stars twinkle in the night sky. A ladybug sits on the coffee cup. Hearts and gentle sparkles float in the air. Text at bottom says 'The End / 完'.
